title: Treasure Trove
description: Do not neglect the opportunity to look into every courtyard in the historical center, because it is a treasure trove of hidden gems waiting to be discovered: from spots with a summer terrace to local residents who will be happy to share urban legends or suggest some atmospheric place hidden from the eyes of the general public, from small shops selling unique souvenirs to cozy cafes serving delicious local food or street performers entertaining passersby.
